hero.title: Government Public Library
hero.subtitle: Prayagraj
hero.description: Preserving knowledge, fostering learning, and serving the community since 1864. Your gateway to endless possibilities through books, research, and cultural heritage.

services.description: Discover the comprehensive range of services designed to support your learning and research needs.
services.membershipDescription: Join our library community and access vast collections of books and resources.
services.archivesDescription: Explore historical documents, rare manuscripts, and digitized collections.
services.researchDescription: Access research facilities and expert assistance for academic work.
services.eResourcesDescription: Download e-books, journals, and access online databases.

cta.description: Join thousands of learners who trust Government Public Library Prayagraj for their educational and research needs.

form.name: Enter Your Name/Organization
form.subject: Enter Subject
form.thankYou: Thank you for your feedback! We will get back to you soon.

contact.address: Government Public Library Chandra Sekhar Azad Park, Prayagraj - 211002

libraryInfo.name: GPL Prayagraj
libraryInfo.established: Established 1864 • Serving the Community for 160+ Years

manuscript.title: Manuscript Collection
manuscript.description: Explore our extensive manuscript collection, featuring unique and rare documents that illuminate the history and culture of significant eras. This collection includes handwritten letters, diaries, legal documents, and more, offering invaluable insights into the lives and thoughts of individuals from ancient times.

hero.title: About Our Library
hero.subtitle: A legacy of knowledge preservation and community service spanning over 160 years

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To serve as the premier public library in Prayagraj, providing free and equal access to information, education, and cultural resources. We are committed to fostering lifelong learning, preserving cultural heritage, and supporting the intellectual growth of our community through innovative services and comprehensive collections.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a world-class library that serves as the intellectual and cultural heart of Prayagraj. We envision a future where every individual has access to the tools and resources needed for learning, research, and personal growth, bridging traditional knowledge with modern technology to create an inclusive learning environment.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Learn more about our administration, working hours, holidays, and the present management committee.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

knowledge.title: Knowledge Preservation
knowledge.description: Committed to preserving and sharing knowledge for future generations.

community.title: Community Service
community.description: Serving the educational and cultural needs of our diverse community.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Striving for excellence in all our services and collections.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Ensuring equal access to information for all members of society.

location.title: Visit Our Library
location.subtitle: Located in the heart of Prayagraj, easily accessible by all modes of transport

hero.title: Collection
hero.subtitle: The Diverse Collection at Prayagraj Public Library
